function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"No evidence that air purifiers alone effectively reduce COVID-19 transmission, potential false sense of security.","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission due to reliance on ineffective air purifiers.","Mitigation":"Use air purifiers as a supplement to HVAC ventilation, ensure no direct airflow onto individuals.","Technologies":"HVAC systems, outdoor air exchange, and window opening strategies.","People":"Building occupants, students, staff, and visitors.","Owner":"Building management, facility maintenance staff, and health and safety professionals."},{"Description":"Inaccurate estimation of ventilation performance and infection risk based on window opening rates, locations, and weather conditions.","Impact":"Misguided ventilation strategies leading to increased viral air infection.","Mitigation":"Conduct field measurements and use accurate methods for estimating ventilation performance and infection risk.","Technologies":"Tracer gas decay method, Wells-Riley equation, and real-time monitoring sensors.","People":"Researchers, building engineers, and facility managers.","Owner":"Research institutions, building management, and health and safety professionals."}]}
